    • Uses of Redis in io.vertx.redis.client

      Methods in io.vertx.redis.client that return Redis 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Redis Redis.batch(List<Request> commands, Handler<AsyncResult<List<Response>>> onSend)
      Sends a list of commands in a single IO operation, this prevents any inter twinning to happen from other client users.
      Redis Redis.connect(Handler<AsyncResult<RedisConnection>> handler)
      Connects to the redis server.
      static Redis Redis.createClient(Vertx vertx)
      Create a new redis client using the default client options.
      static Redis Redis.createClient(Vertx vertx, RedisOptions options)
      Create a new redis client using the given client options.
      static Redis Redis.createClient(Vertx vertx, String connectionString)
      Create a new redis client using the default client options.
      default Redis Redis.send(Request command, Handler<AsyncResult<Response>> onSend)
      Send the given command to the redis server or cluster.
